casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Patrick RYAN 366A10-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2017 Marilyn G. Ozer, Attorney at Law, William F. Massengale, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Ryan, Michael Patrick. Kelvin Atkinson, Assistant District Attorney, Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

William Stevenson, Assistant District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of April 2017 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of April 2017."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 5th day of June 2017 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
